document_data.caption: A painting of a daisy, the holy symbol of [[Sheela Peryroyl]]
document_data.name: Daisy
document_data.mainbody: A '''daisy''', also known as '''woundwort''' was a flowering plant very similar in appearance to [[chamomile]].
document_data.Use: Daisy plants could be used to create healing poultices.
document_data.Habitat: Daisy flowers were known to grow in the [[Savage Frontier]] region, where they were often used to crate curative poultices. The areas of [[Dunwood]] were known to have fields of flowering daisies.
document_data.Religion:
The appearance of daisies could indicate the favor or encouragement of [[Ilmater]], the deity of suffering and martyrdom.

[[Finder Wyvernspur]] sometimes manifested himself to his most loyal followers as a daisy flower, sprouting to life, maturing, blossoming, and dying, all within a few moments.{{Cite polyhedron/119/Forgotten Deities: Finder Wyvernspur|22}}
